dk.nesos.view.text
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  dk.nesos.view.text.Text

public final class Text
extends Object

Skal kunne instantieres med forskellig skrifttype

Skal kunne skrive 2D og 3D, drawString2D(String, x, y), drawString3D(String, x, y, z)

Author:
NDHB

Method Detail

cleanup

public void cleanup()

Releases previously allocated resources (ie. display lists and texture object).

drawString2D

public void drawString2D(String string,
                         int x,
                         int y)

Draws the specified string at the given coordinates in orthographic projection (2D).

Note: The coordinates are given in OpenGL fashion, ie. (0,0) = lower-left corner of the screen

Parameters:
string -
x - coordinate
y - coordinate

drawString3D

public void drawString3D(String string)

Draws the specified string in the current coordinate system (3D).

Parameters:
string -

drawTexture

public void drawTexture(int width,
                        int height)

Draws the font as one textured quad on the x-axis of the current coordinate system. This makes examining the font easier.

Parameters:
width - of the quad being drawn
height - of the quad being drawn

getTextureName

public int getTextureName()

Provided for user to manipulate texture parameters.

Returns:
the name of the texture being used.

getTexturePriority

public float getTexturePriority()

public boolean hasDepthTesting()

Whether or not depth test is currently enabled.

Returns:
boolean

hasLighting

public boolean hasLighting()

Whether or not lighting is currently enabled.

Returns:
boolean

isTextureCompressed

public boolean isTextureCompressed()

isTextureResident

public boolean isTextureResident()

setAnisotropicFiltering

public void setAnisotropicFiltering(float value)

Enables or disables anisotropic filtering on the font texture.

Valid values are between 1.0 and the implementation specific constant GL_MAX_TEXTURE_MAX_ANISOTROPY_EXT (both inclusive).

A value of 1.0 effectively disables anisotropic filtering.

Parameters:
value -

setDepthTesting

public void setDepthTesting(boolean depthTesting)

Enables or disables the depth test when rendering. When enabled the text can be occluded by other objects in 3D space. When disabled the text always appears on top of other objects.

Parameters:
depthTesting -

setLighting

public void setLighting(boolean lighting)

Enables or disables lighting calculations on the text.

Parameters:
lighting -

createDisplayLists

private int createDisplayLists()

Creates a display list for each character in the font.

Returns:
the base list name of the sequence of display lists created.

createFontTexture

private int createFontTexture()

doneText

private void doneText()

Should be called when done rendering all characters in the text. The method restores previously saved OpenGL states.

getTextureCoordinates

private Vector4f getTextureCoordinates(int character)

Calculates the texture coordinates for the specified character in the font.

Parameters:
character -
Returns:
a Vector4f with the texture coordinates

prepareText

private void prepareText()

Should be called prior to rendering the characters in the text. The method saves current OpenGL states and enables those required for rendering.

resetPerspectiveProjection

private void resetPerspectiveProjection()

setOrthographicProjection

private void setOrthographicProjection(int width,
                                       int height)

Prepares an orthographic projection matrix. Saves the current matrices on the matrixstack.

Remember to call resetPerspectiveProjection when done in orthographic mode

Parameters:
width - of the projection screen
height - of the projection screen
